Text: Sinbad the Sailor (Arabic: ٱلسِّنْدِبَادُ ٱلْبَحرِيّ‎ ‎ "as-Sindibādu al-Baḥriyy") also spelled Sindbad, is a fictional sailor and the hero of a story-cycle of Middle Eastern origin; he is described as living in Baghdad, during the Abbasid Caliphate.
